meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>foolish</kanji> and <kanji>stupid</kanji> person will make lots of <vocabulary>idle complaint</vocabulary>s. You really don't like being around them because they <vocabulary>grumble</vocabulary> about how nothing is good enough all the time. But they really just don't get it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
